mapper.select: select distinct name, age, R.movieNum from roomMovieTime R left join movie M on (R.movieNum = M.movieNum) where date_format(startTime, '%Y-%m-%d') = #{startTime}

select R.*, TR.* from roomMovieTime R left join theaterRoom TR on (R.theaterRoomCode = TR.theaterRoomCode) where date_format(startTime, '%Y-%m-%d') = #{startTime} and name = #{name} order by startTime asc
